author: hwright
msg: * dev/svn-trunk/tools/dist/nightly.sh:
Remove accidental 'exit 1' from r1137799.

author: molinaro
msg: turn off eunit for now, so build works on apache jenkins server

author: julianfoad
msg: In the dirent_uri tests, make each is_ancestor test share a set of test
cases with the corresponding skip_ancestor test, because the semantics of
each such pair of functions should be compatible and this helps to ensure
that they are.  Each new set contains at least the union of the two old
sets, and in the dirent and relpath cases it contains some new test cases as
well.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(testcase_ancestor_t): New struct.
(testcase_is_ancestor_t, testcase_skip_ancestor_t): Remove.
(dirent_ancestor_tests, relpath_ancestor_tests, uri_ancestor_tests): New
sets of test cases.
(test_dirent_is_ancestor, test_dirent_skip_ancestor): Use
dirent_ancestor_tests instead of an internal set of test cases.
(test_relpath_is_ancestor, test_relpath_skip_ancestor): Use
relpath_ancestor_tests instead of an internal set of test cases.
(test_uri_is_ancestor, test_uri_skip_ancestor): Use
uri_ancestor_tests instead of an internal set of test cases.

author: gstein
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c:
(finish_report): add clarifying comment about the main loop as it
relates to the XML pausing process

author: gstein
msg: Fix a bug found by Ivan.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c:
(write_to_pending): after writing content to the disk, we need to exit
to avoid also writing to memory.
